page.title: 07FARMING IN BADENOCH - 4
page.content:
{1985}has brought news of farms being sold and farmers trust their leases will be renewed. Buyers must be found who will agree to lease back the {shooting rights}on the hills as the sellers wish to retain these rights as a source of income as well as for personal use.
Land along the river is being sold and it is hoped that the neighbouring {R.S.P.B.}will add it to their Bird Reserve at Insh Marshes. The present owner talks of draining it but this is considered against everybody's interests - perhaps even the farmer's, as the soil is poor.
{*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
